name: Part 1: Generate New HeyGen Videos from Google Sheets in Bulk
description:
Use this template to create videos in HeyGen in bulk from new rows in Google Sheets. Before you start, make sure you create a new Google Sheet spreadsheet with these columns:
  • Video Title - title for you video.
  • Script - this is where you will enter your script which will be sent to HeyGen.
  • HeyGen Video ID
  • Video Link
Note that this template is only triggering the video creation. If you also want to capture links to the generated videos, you will also need to [use this template as step 2.](https://eu1.make.com/2508/templates/8961/edit?templatePublicId=14742)
